name: A Tail of Hail and Blaze
name_original: A Tail of Hail and Blaze
description: This is the last prototype we had to do for the Game Mechanics III subject, and we had to do a multiplayer game. I chose to do a co-op game in which you had to teleport with your pal in order to defeat some bad guys and get over some obstacles because one has fire powers and the other ice powers. I had some issues with checkpoints and the main mechanic (teleporting) that I plan to fix in a future when I have enough free time.
